keyPolicies.policyTitle: KEEP UP MY CAMPAIGN FOR BETTER ROADS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: With the help of local people I managed to secure funds to improve the Lower Road on Sheppey and the Stockbury Roundabout. Now I will press for other roads in our area to be improved.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: KEEP PUSHING FOR LESS HOUSING IN OUR AREA
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Sittingbourne and Sheppey has taken more than its fair share of the housing needed to meet Swale's target. Although I will continue to push for a lower target, any housing developments that must be built should take place in Faversham.

There is a shortage of GPs in our area. The reasons are complex, but solvable. There will be an improvement once the proposed medical school is opened in Kent. However, I will continue to press for action to help attract more doctors to Sittingbourne and Sheppey.
